title: Bug 11863: Update Test Suite action does not allow removing
OB: When updating the Test Suite, selecting 'Y' in the dialog does not make it clear that 'X' will be removed.
EB: The Update Test Suite action should clearly indicate that selecting 'Y' in the dialog will result in the removal of 'X'.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the Test Suite. 
2. Update the Test Suite by selecting 'Y' in the dialog. 
3. Verify that 'X' has been removed.
